meanings.definition: The act of seeing or catching sight of something.
meanings.sent1: The sightings of birds in the park brought joy to the children.
meanings.sent2: There were many sightings of shooting stars during the meteor shower.
meanings.sent3: The sightings of the mischievous squirrel stealing nuts made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her sightings of success in her career motivated her to work harder.
meanings.sent5: The sightings of the rare flower in the forest were like finding a hidden treasure.

meanings.definition: Instances of seeing or observing something.
meanings.sent1: The multiple sightings of UFOs puzzled the scientists.
meanings.sent2: Police investigated the sightings of a mysterious figure in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The sightings of the cat trying to catch its tail were quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His sightings of potential danger helped him avoid accidents on the road.
meanings.sent5: The sightings of the full moon on Halloween night created a spooky atmosphere.
